8-Year-Old Girl Child Allegedly Raped By Neighbour In MP. When Will The Crimes Against Minors Come Down?

8-Year-Old Girl Child Allegedly Raped By Neighbour In MP. When Will The Crimes Against Minors Come Down?

Crimes against women refuses to come down in our country. Every other day, we hear cases of moletation, rape and harassments. In yet another heinous incident, a 4-year-old girl was allegedly raped by her 30-year-old neighbour in Guna, Madhya Pradesh. An FIR has been registered and the accused has been arrested, police said.

Not only this incident, a day ago, police arrested a man for allegedly raping an 8-year-old girl in Daudpur area of Alwar after the incident was caught on the CCTV camera installed in the region.

"The man was caught raping a minor girl on a CCTV camera. Based on the footage, we identified the accused and arrested him," said Superintendent of Police (SP) Paris Deshmukh said.

representational image

According to the police, the incident occurred around 2 am on October 6 when the man identified as Gaurav lured the eight-year-old girl from a Durga Puja pandal and raped her.

"We also went to the girl's house. She had not informed her parents about the incident," Deshmukh said. The accused has confessed to the crime, he said.

Three days ago too, a 14-year-old girl was allegedly raped and strangled to death in Shamli district.

According to Circle Officer Rajesh Kumar Tiwari, the girl's body was found in an agricultural field in Kailshikapur village, which comes under the jurisdiction of Gahripukhta police station. In the complaint, they said their daughter had gone to bring lunch for her father and since then, she had been missing, Tiwari said.

ap/representational image

Last month also, a 12-year-old girl was sexually abused for over two years by 30 people, including her father. The incident came to light in Kerala's Malappuram. The girl studying in Class 7.

These are the reported cases that have actually come to light only in this week and those that go unreported could be much higher.
